room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: We tried our hand at the Conspiracy room and were amazed at the level of detail and complexity of the puzzles. We were challenged from start to finish and absolutely LOVED it! We cannot wait to go back. Huge kudos to Clue IQ and their team for upping the escape room game for all of us!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: Amazing experience. Very friendly staff. We did the Conspiracy room and it was AMAZING! We can't wait to go back and do another room. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun and great time!

room_title: Escape room "Conspiracy" by Clue IQ in Frederick
review: Our group did the Conspiracy room and it was fantastic! You are totally immersed into the conspiracies of history in this room. Having to crack the codes individually and then having to put them all together in the end. I definitely encourage everyone to play Clue IQs rooms, as the owner is knowledgeable and passionate over his rooms. Well done!
